alert.note: Alert for Cavalier; Pembina (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 8:09PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Pembina River at Walhalla affecting Pembina and Cavalier Counties. .The Pembina River at Walhalla continues to rise and fall inside minor flood stage. Expect this trend to continue over the next 24 hours. Additional rainfall is expected this weekend and this forecast only takes into account forecasted rainfall through 7 PM Saturday. Further rises are possible. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pembina River at Walhalla. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.5 feet, Flooding occurs along the left bank. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Friday the stage was 14.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 PM CDT Friday was 14.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.1 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
